security: This document is a record material tracking form, indicating its charged status and required return to IP/Archives. Sharing this could reveal internal record-keeping procedures.
summary: This is a record tracking form documenting the location and status of a classified document, specifying its return instructions and assigned control numbers.
summary_one_paragraph: A record material tracking form indicating that a SECRET document, related to 'Unidad Revolucionario Part VI' and spanning from January 1967 through February 1968, has been charged out. The form provides instructions for its return to IP/Archives, specifies the record center job number, space number, file number, folder number, and box number, and indicates that the document should be returned immediately after use to the Records Center.
title: Record Material Tracking Form
